maqras.text: Sbuccuaen Oebbi, kra illan deg igenwan, u kra illan di tmurt. Agellid, Ssid, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
D Neppa id Iuznen i wid ur ne$oi, Amazan segsen, iqqao asen issekniyen iS. Izizdig iten, isselmad asen Tazmamt akked uuwab, xas llan, zik, di ttelfan n uuee
U i wid nniven, mara awven $uosen. Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
D wagi ay d lfevl n Oebbi. Ippak it i win Ib$a. Oebbi, d bab n lfevl ameqwoahan
Am wid iwumi ippukelfen s Tuoa, ur p ssawven. Cuban a$yul ibubben tizmamin. I icmet umedya n ugdud inekoen issekniyen n Oebbi! Oebbi ur Inehhu ara agdud imednas
Ini: "a yudayen, ma t$ilem d kunwi ay d iebiben n Oebbi, war imdanen, ssutret tameppant, ma tessawalem tidep
Ur p ssuturen ara, d awez$i, ilmend igiten nnsen. Oebbi Issen imednas
Ini: "tameppant iwumi tregwlem, a kwen id temmager, war ccekk. Sinna, a kwen awin ar Win Ieoan ayen iffren akked wayen ur neffir. Ad awen Imel ayen txeddmem
A wid iumnen! Ma ssawlen d i teallit, ass unejmua, $iwlet ar usmekti n Oebbi, eebset ttjaoa. Ppif akka i kunwi, lemmer tessinem
Mi tfukk teallit, mfaoaqet di tmurt, nadit lfevl n Oebbi, mmektit ed aias Oebbi, amar a prebeem
Mi walan ssuq, ne$ anecoee, ad azlen $uoes, a k ooen tbeddev. Ini: "ayen illan ar Oebbi yif anecoee akked ssuq. Oebbi Yif akw ioeeeaqen
Ma usan d $uoek ixabiten, ad ak inin: "a ncehhed ar kecc, war ccekk, d Amazan n Oebbi". Oebbi Ieoa ar kecc, war ccekk, d Amazan iS. Oebbi ad Icehhed ar, s tidep, ixabiten d ikeddaben
Eesben tagallit nnsen d laanaya, d$a ssefoa$en abrid n Oebbi. Ihi, a yicmet wayen xeddmen
Akka, acku llan umnen, sinna, jehlen. Ppusel$en wulawen nnsen, d$a nitni ur meiuen
